Text: The Tahiti national football team is the French national team of French Polynesia and is controlled by the Fédération Tahitienne de Football.

Text: Tahiti national football team:  The team consists of a selection of players from French Polynesia, not just Tahiti, and has competed in the Oceania Football Confederation since 1990.
